subject: Running
Doping (Sports)
Commonwealth Games
lead_paragraph: Amantle Montsho of Botswana, a former world champion in the 400 meters, faces a two-year suspension after testing positive for a banned substance, track and field officials said.
snippet: Amantle Montsho of Botswana, a former world champion in the 400 meters, faces a two-year suspension after testing positive for a banned substance, track and field officials said.
